meta.description: Determine the number of small and large bones to produce to minimize meat usage while satisfying medication and preference constraints.

sets.name: BONES
sets.description: Types of bones produced by the hospital.

params.name: medication_required
params.description: Units of tooth medication required per bone type.

params.name: meat_required
params.description: Units of meat required per bone type.

params.name: total_medication
params.description: Total units of tooth medication available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of bone to produce.

objective.name: min_total_meat
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of meat used.

constraints.name: medication_constraint
constraints.description: Total medication used must not exceed available supply.

constraints.name: preference_constraint
constraints.description: At least 50% of the bones made must be small.

constraints.name: large_bone_minimum
constraints.description: At least 30 large bones must be produced.
